sentences.english: The North was still cold chilly, but everywhere in the Southland already provided a green view.
sentences.chinese: 北国还在春寒料峭，南国已然绿色满园。

sentences.english: No, she happily bears nice fruit in chilly spring wind, making people feel substantial.
sentences.chinese: 红梅在料峭的春风里喜结佳果，给人们以充实感。

sentences.english: It was piercing cold, too; all was gloomy and black.
sentences.chinese: 寒意料峭，一切都显得阴森而幽暗。

sentences.english: It was a very cold night in winter.
sentences.chinese: 夜寒料峭，简直跟冬天相差无几。

sentences.english: The happiness also comes from our doing translation in the freezing winter.
sentences.chinese: 翻译乐啊，乐在料峭的严冬。

sentences.english: The dawn of the day. On the tip of the barley. The frost of spring.
sentences.chinese: 熹微又清晨，盈盈麦尖应尽是，寒霜料峭春。

sentences.english: This week his optimistic pragmatism was tested in a chilly, autumnal Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 本周，他乐观实用主义在秋寒料峭的莫斯科接受检验。

definition: The north wind is icy cold.
to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
